annotations.description: Today we tackle Trader Vic's Grog from the 1960's and try and answer the question: What The Hell IS Grog?? Well strap on in fellow Barflies, the history of g...
annotations.title: When I Drink Trader Vic's Grog I Turn Into A Pirate

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Dark Jamaica Rum
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
1oz (30ml) Pineapple Juice
1oz (30ml) Passionfruit Syrup
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
Mint Sprig, Cherry Garnish

Whip shake and top with crushed ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Nl9aWKvwmw
title: Trader Vic's Grog
